snippet.title: Elly : First Look (10 Mins Uncut Game-Play) NEW GAME!
snippet.description:
This is an announcement video showing one month of work so far on my NEW game called Elly. This is a followup to my first game WanderingThroughTheVines(Available on STEAM). The video shows the beginning of the game, and 10 minutes of game-play from about half of the first level. 
     So far I have two levels almost complete with animations and Unique Bosses for each but i am keeping them secret for now. I have some placeholder music (the song potion is a ruffcut) in parts and need to move around some of the enemies. You can see in the beginning one of my patrol enemies was stuck XD. There is still a lot to show and even more work to be done but I wanted to show and tease the game.
